tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE content_localization (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    language_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    translated_text TEXT,
    translated_images JSON,
    cultural_adaptions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Translation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    language_code VARCHAR,
    translated_text TEXT,
    image_url VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE CulturalAdaptation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    culture_code VARCHAR,
    adaptation_description TEXT,
    audio_url VARCHAR
);
